title: Taking the Cube Root.
text: What is $$\sqrt[3]{8}$$, what can be multiplied by itself $$3$$ times to get 8? $$2\times2\times2=8$$, so $$\sqrt[3]{8}=2$$. Therefore $$f(14)=2$$.
